data.comment: The match is underway in Pohang.
Kim Woo-sung awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai in the half of Pohang Steelers.
Free kick for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 3, In Pohang, Lee Seung-mo of Pohang Steelers is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Pohang Steelers.
Goal! Stanislav Iljutcenko heads Pohang Steelers into a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 3, Kang Sang-woo with an assist there.
Pohang Steelers have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
Lee Seung-mo (Pohang Steelers) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 6, Corner awarded to Pohang Steelers.
Pohang Steelers attack but Stanislav Iljutcenko's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Ulsan Hyundai at Pohang Steel Yard.
In the minute 7, Pohang Steelers needs to be cautious. Ulsan Hyundai have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
In the minute 9, Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Pohang Steelers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai's half?
In Pohang a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
Lee Kwang-hyeok is booked for the home team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Pohang.
In the minute 13, Kim Woo-sung signals a Pohang Steelers throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Ulsan Hyundai goal kick.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
In the minute 16, Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers.
Kang Sang-woo hits the bar! Very nearly a goal there for Pohang Steelers in Pohang.
Free kick Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 21, Throw-in Pohang Steelers.
Pohang Steelers have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
Seung-hyun Jung (Ulsan Hyundai) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 25, Ulsan Hyundai to take a throw-in in Pohang Steelers territory.
In Pohang Ulsan Hyundai drive forward through Bjorn Johnsen. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Pohang Steelers have a goal kick.
In the minute 27, Ulsan Hyundai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers at Pohang Steel Yard.
Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 29, Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Ulsan Hyundai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 31, Kim Woo-sung signals a Ulsan Hyundai throw-in in Pohang Steelers's half.
Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in the half of Pohang Steelers.
Kim Woo-sung awards Pohang Steelers a goal kick.
In the minute 33, Ball safe as Ulsan Hyundai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 38, Pohang Steelers are pushing forward but Lee Seung-mo's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Ulsan Hyundai goal kick.
Ulsan Hyundai are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Kim Woo-sung waits before resuming play because Kang Hyeon-mu for Pohang Steelers is still down.
Kang Hyeon-mu for Pohang Steelers is back on the field again.
In the minute 44, Ulsan Hyundai's Lee Dong-kyeong misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Pohang.
Ulsan Hyundai awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Ulsan Hyundai's Kim In-sung gets in a shot on goal at Pohang Steel Yard. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ulsan Hyundai have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
In the minute 45, Can Ulsan Hyundai capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Pohang Steelers's half?
Kim Woo-sung signals a throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai, close to Pohang Steelers's area.
Ulsan Hyundai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Kim In-sung for Ulsan Hyundai drives towards goal at Pohang Steel Yard. But the finish is unsuccessful.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Pohang Steel Yard.
In the minute 46, Junior Negrao is on a sub for Lee Dong-kyeong for Ulsan Hyundai.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers in the half of Ulsan Hyundai.
Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
In the minute 47, Pohang Steelers to take a throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai territory.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers at Pohang Steel Yard.
In the minute 48, Can Ulsan Hyundai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pohang Steelers's half?
Throw-in Pohang Steelers.
Ulsan Hyundai pushes forward through Junior Negrao, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 50, Kim Woo-sung signals a Ulsan Hyundai throw-in in Pohang Steelers's half.
Important block from the Pohang Steelers defence as Yoon Bit-garam fires in a strike for Ulsan Hyundai.
Kim Woo-sung awards Pohang Steelers a goal kick.
In the minute 51, Lee Seung-mo gets his shot on target but fails to score for Pohang Steelers.
Corner awarded to Ulsan Hyundai.
Pohang Steelers have a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Ulsan Hyundai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Ulsan Hyundai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ulsan Hyundai have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 56, Kim In-sung (Ulsan Hyundai) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick Pohang Steelers.
He's off! Dave Bulthuis is shown a red card.
In the minute 58, Pohang Steelers make their first substitution with Song Min-kyu replacing Lee Kwang-hyeok.
Pohang Steelers's Kang Sang-woo gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Ulsan Hyundai defender.
Pohang Steelers have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
In the minute 61, Kim Woo-sung awards the away team a throw-in.
At Pohang Steel Yard, Bjorn Johnsen is shown a red card and sent off.
Corner awarded to Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 67, Goal kick for Ulsan Hyundai at Pohang Steel Yard.
Kim Do-Hoon (Ulsan Hyundai) is making a second substitution, with Won Du-jae replacing Yoon Bit-garam.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers just outside Ulsan Hyundai's area.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Pohang Steelers close to the penalty box.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Pohang Steelers close to the penalty box.
Goal! Pohang Steelers extend their lead to 2-0 through Stanislav Iljutcenko.
In the minute 73, The home team replace Oh Beom-seok with Aleksandar Palocevic.
Pohang Steelers drives forward and Song Min-kyu gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Pohang Steelers have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
In the minute 78, Kang Sang-woo of Pohang Steelers gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Ulsan Hyundai at Pohang Steel Yard.
Goal! Aleksandar Palocevic extends Pohang Steelers's lead to 3-0.
In the minute 79, That's a fine assist from Song Min-kyu.
Pohang Steelers move into a more comfortable 4-0 lead. Aleksandar Palocevic is the scorer with a header!
Kang Sang-woo instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
In the minute 82, Ulsan Hyundai awarded a free kick in their own half.
The away team have replaced Sin Jin-ho with Lee Keun-ho. This is the third substitution made today by Kim Do-Hoon.
Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
Throw-in Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 85, In Pohang Pohang Steelers drive forward through Manuel Palacios. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ulsan Hyundai will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Pohang Steelers.
Go Young-jun is replacing Manuel Palacios for Pohang Steelers at Pohang Steel Yard.
In the minute 86, Stanislav Iljutcenko (Pohang Steelers) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Ulsan Hyundai defenders.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Pohang Steelers's Lee Seung-mo is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 87, Can Pohang Steelers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 89, Aleksandar Palocevic of Pohang Steelers smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
Ball safe as Ulsan Hyundai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kim Woo-sung awards the away team a throw-in.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Ulsan Hyundai push forward at Pohang Steel Yard and Junior Negrao gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Pohang Steelers defence.
Ulsan Hyundai have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
Ulsan Hyundai drive upfield and Kim In-sung gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Pohang Steelers defender.
Corner awarded to Ulsan Hyundai.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
Ulsan Hyundai drives forward and Lee Keun-ho gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Go Young-jun gets his shot on target but fails to score for Pohang Steelers.
Corner awarded to Pohang Steelers.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 4-0.
